name: handie
description: 为前端开发提供统一的布局、组件和工具方法

scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:js
scripts.major:core: cd src/core && npm version major && cd ../..
scripts.minor:core: cd src/core && npm version minor && cd ../..
scripts.patch:core: cd src/core && npm version patch && cd ../..
scripts.babel:core: babel src/core/utils -d dist/core/utils && babel src/core/adapters -d dist/core/adapters
scripts.prerelease:core: npm run compile:core && npm run pack:core
scripts.update:jquery: cd src/jquery && npm r -D handie && npm i -D handie && cd ../..
scripts.major:jquery: cd src/jquery && npm version major && cd ../..
scripts.minor:jquery: cd src/jquery && npm version minor && cd ../..
scripts.patch:jquery: cd src/jquery && npm version patch && cd ../..
scripts.update:vue: cd src/vue && npm r -S handie && npm i -S handie && cd ../..
scripts.major:vue: cd src/vue && npm version major && cd ../..
scripts.minor:vue: cd src/vue && npm version minor && cd ../..
scripts.patch:vue: cd src/vue && npm version patch && cd ../..
scripts.babel:vue: babel src/vue/utils -d dist/vue/utils && babel src/vue/adapters -d dist/vue/adapters && babel src/vue/mixins -d dist/vue/mixins && babel src/vue/plugins -d dist/vue/plugins
scripts.postcompile:vue: cp -R src/vue/components/ dist/vue/components/ && npm run babel:vue
scripts.prerelease:vue: npm run compile:vue && npm run pack:vue

author: Ourai Lin <ourairyu@gmail.com> (http://ourai.ws/)
